info.en: Ability to open some doors and chests. A door (or a chest) needs two turns of picking to be open
info.zh_cn: 能够打开一些门和箱子。一扇门（或一个箱子）需要两轮拾取才能打开

info.en: When attacking, this character will deal damage twice
If an ally is adjacent to the unit, during combat defense and resistance are increased by 1
info.zh_cn: 如果有盟友与该单位相邻，战斗时防御力和抵抗力增加1

info.en: Probability to stun an enemy when using a weapon able to do it is increased by 5%
info.zh_cn: 使用能够击晕敌人的武器时，击晕敌人的概率提高5%
